content:
IsOffscreenBehavior Enum

Definition

Specifies how the stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen* property is determined.

In this Article

public enum IsOffscreenBehavior
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
IsOffscreenBehavior

Fields

Default

stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen* is calculated based on the stem.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible* property.
FromClip

stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen* is calculated based on clip regions.
Offscreen

stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen* is true.
Onscreen

stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen* is false.
